transfer_info: You can move your {{dragonStage}} (token) between your accounts or send it to somebody, as a gift for example.

sale.title: To sale
sale.info: You can set the custom price and put your {{dragonStage}} (token) on the marketplace for sale.

fights_modal.title: To arena
fights_modal.info: Put your dragon (token) on a battlefield! Other players will be able to fight with your dragon.

breed_modal.title: Breeding
breed_modal.info: Set a price and put your dragon (token) on a marketplace, where other players can pay you to mate their dragons with yours.
breed_modal.set_price: Set a whores price in ZLP.

suicide_modal.title: Suicide
suicide_modal.info: If you are cruel enough you can burn your {{dragonStage}} (token) forever!

hatch_egg.title: Hatch an egg
hatch_egg.info: You can hatch an egg for become a dragon.
